articles.author: Berkeley Lovelace Jr.
articles.title: Covid is officially America's deadliest pandemic as U.S. fatalities surpass 1918 flu estimates - CNBC
articles.description: Reported U.S. deaths due to Covid crossed 675,000, Johns Hopkins data shows, and is still increasing at an average of more than 1,900 fatalities per day.
articles.content: Covid-19 is officially the most deadly outbreak in recent American history, surpassing the estimated U.S. fatalities from the 1918 influenza pandemic, according to data compiled by Johns Hopkins Univ… [+3592 chars]

articles.author: Trip Gabriel
articles.title: Abortion Poll: Most Americans Disagree With Supreme Court on Texas Ban - The New York Times
articles.description: Monmouth University Poll released its findings the same day the Supreme Court added hearings on a Mississippi abortion case.
articles.content: A majority of Americans disapproves of the Supreme Courts recent decision to allow a ban on most abortions to take effect in Texas, with key aspects of the law such as empowering private citizens to … [+1176 chars]

articles.title: Coronavirus: What's happening in Canada and around the world Monday - CBC.ca
articles.description: COVID-19 has now killed about as many Americans as the 1918-19 flu pandemic did — approximately 675,000.
articles.content:
The latest:
COVID-19 has now killed about as many Americans as the 1918-19 flu pandemic did approximately 675,000.

articles.title: Wang Leehom, Vivian Hsu apologise for breaching Taiwan's Covid-19 rules to have a meal - AsiaOne
